Articles.Content: i need some good solar panels!.... cant find any preferably long and not too thick (for station basics)

I dont really like that you called this urgent, its not really. if you dont find your solar panels, no one dies...

Have you searched through the mod repository? All we have is what you see there....

I agree I need solar panels too. ones that can power some ion engines i have. I keep searching through the add-ons section but cant find any that are updated and available to use. if any one can help that would be great

I'm using a combination of the Kosmos and MMI panels. Modded the Kosmos panels to be Powertech/MuMech compatible, so, not only do they auto-focus on the sun correctly, they actually provide power to the MMI Ion engines and batteries.

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/13692

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/6680
